amendment.description: Amendment secures the most critical components of America's electrical infrastructure against the threat posed by a potentially catastrophic electromagnetic pulse.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 4 printed in House report 114-359 to secure the most critical components of America's electrical infrastructure against the threat posed by a potentially catastrophic electromagnetic pulse.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Franks (AZ).
